title: [Upper Trollfang, Glatoph]
description: The chill wind whips across the face of the mountain, scouring away what little soil is left and leaving bare rock.  A pair of stunted thorn bushes and some clingy grey-green moss are the only signs of life that you see.

The chill wind whips across the face of the mountain, scouring away what little soil is left and leaving bare rock.  A pair of stunted thorn bushes, their spikes silvered by moonlight, and some clingy greyish moss are the only signs of life that you see.
